triples.name: Biodiversity
triples.relevance: The paper investigates mechanisms that maintain microbial biodiversity in communities.

triples.name: Coexistence theory
triples.relevance: The paper examines whether pairwise coexistence is required for multispecies coexistence.

triples.name: Competitive exclusion principle
triples.relevance: Competitive exclusion was the most common outcome observed in pairwise competition experiments.

triples.name: Image analysis
triples.relevance: The paper developed an automated image analysis pipeline to quantify species abundances.

triples.name: Enrichment culture
triples.relevance: The paper conducted experiments using enrichment communities as the primary study system.

triples.name: Community (ecology)
triples.relevance: The paper demonstrates that multispecies coexistence is an emergent property of community context.

triples.name: Microbial ecology
triples.relevance: The paper addresses fundamental questions about microbial community structure and biodiversity.
